title: Bbleep and the Bright Spot
prompt: Write a short story about a robot dog
preview: Bbleep and the Bright Spot In the heart of a bustling futuristic town called Neon Haven, there lived a robot dog named Bbleep. Unlike other robots built for surveillance or rescue missions, Bbleep was programmed with a quirky personality. His creators, a group of misfit engineers, had given him a pi...
